## Installation Commands

### Windows
```powershell
# winget, chocolatey, or direct download
winget install --id Package.ID
```

### macOS
```bash
# Homebrew or direct download
brew install package-name
```

### Linux
```bash
# apt, dnf, yum, snap, or direct download
sudo apt-get install -y package-name
```

## Verification Command

```bash
# Command to check if tool is installed
toolname --version
```
